verbose_text: Abdominal symptoms (pain, diarrhea) should lead to consideration of neutropenic enterocolitis, also known as typhlitis, which is an incompletely understood condition of ileocolonic inflammation which can lead to intestinal necrosis and perforation and is associated with a high mortality rate [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: inflammation which can lead to intestinal necrosis
